pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: University of Delaware Library, Special Collections
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Frank E. and Anna Haynes Owens Papers
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: The Frank E. and Anna Hayes Owens family papers comprises 14.3 linear feet of materials, spanning the dates between 1900 and 2011, and includes correspondence, manuscripts, photographs, travel brochures, reel-to-reel tapes, magazines, fanzines, and other materials documenting intergenerational American family life in Delaware.
pageContext._xxxcollectionExtentxtxt: Approximately 25 recordings, 14.3 linear feet and 1 oversize box (17 boxes)
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: Use of materials from this collection beyond the exceptions provided for in the Fair Use and Educational Use clauses of the U.S. Copyright Law may violate federal law.
